summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing Ordinance 111169 which created Local Improvement District No. 6739 for the improvement of Perkins Lane West, adjoining Tracts 3 to 5, inclusive,, "Shurick Extension of Carleton Beach Tracts Addition" (being in the vicinity of property commonly known as 1925 Perkins Lane West), by constructing a retaining wall, etc.
